titleStmt.title: A full relation of two journeys, the one into the main-land of France, the other into some of the adjacent ilands performed and digested into six books / by Peter Heylyn.
Full relation of two journeys
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes for Henry Seile ...,

notesStmt.note: "The relation of the first journey" and "The second journey" each have special t.p.
Also published, in the same year, as: A survey of the estate of France, and some of the adjoyning ilands.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
